findings.title: Typographical errors
findings.description: The audit report highlights three instances of typographical errors in the code comments and variable names.

findings.title: QSP-19 Token Balances Not Validated
findings.description: It is highly recommended to check the changes in the balance after the token transfer is expected to avoid most of the non-standard behavior of external token contracts from being used by a hacker as a tool to manipulate the contract.
